## Picking Practice

-   Alternate picking, fingers 4-3-2-1, from E to e string, 25 repetitions

-   Alternate picking, 2x each time, fingers 1-2-3-4, from E to e string, 25 repetitions

-   Alternate picking, fingers 1-3-2-4, from E to e string, 25 repetitions
